Description:
Detects known suspicious (default) user-agents related to scanning/recon tools

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious User-Agents Related To Recon Tools
Query: (cs-user-agent="*Wfuzz/*" OR cs-user-agent="*WPScan v*" OR cs-user-agent="*Recon-ng/v*" OR cs-user-agent="*GIS - AppSec Team - Project Vision*")
